languages.text: Побледневшая капитан Маттина разразилась чередой приказов, требуя сомкнуться вокруг Вольного Торговца и ожидать опасности — но тут крик из вокса сменился смехом.
The pale-faced Captain Mattina barked out a stream of orders, telling the unit to close ranks around the Rogue Trader and prepare for trouble — but then the yelling from the vox turned to laughter.
languages.original_text: Побледневшая капитан Маттина разразилась чередой приказов, требуя сомкнуться вокруг Вольного Торговца и ожидать опасности — но тут крик из вокса сменился смехом.

traits.locale_text: The pale-faced Captain Mattina barked out a stream of orders, telling the unit to close ranks around the Rogue Trader and prepare for trouble — but then the yelling from the vox turned to laughter.
The pale-faced Captain Mattina barked out a stream of orders, telling the unit to close ranks around the Rogue Trader and prepare for trouble — but then the yelling from the vox turned to laughter.
The pale-faced Captain Mattina barked out a stream of orders, telling the unit to close ranks around the Rogue Trader and prepare for trouble — but then the yelling from the vox turned to laughter.
The pale-faced Captain Mattina barked out a stream of orders, telling the unit to close ranks around the Rogue Trader and prepare for trouble — but then the yelling from the vox turned to laughter.

languages.text: La pálida capitana Mattina tomó el control de la situación, ordenando a su unidad que cerrara filas en torno a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y se preparara para tener problemas. Sin embargo, los gritos del voco pronto dieron paso a la risa.
languages.original_text: The pale-faced Captain Mattina barked out a stream of orders, telling the unit to close ranks around the Rogue Trader and prepare for trouble — but then the yelling from the vox turned to laughter.

traits.locale_text: La pálida capitana Mattina tomó el control de la situación, ordenando a su unidad que cerrara filas en torno a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y se preparara para tener problemas. Sin embargo, los gritos del voco pronto dieron paso a la risa.

languages.text: 马蒂娜上尉脸色苍白，吼出了一连串命令，让她的士兵靠拢在行商浪人身边，准备应对接下来的麻烦。然而，音阵装置传来的吼声却马上变成了哈哈大笑。
languages.original_text: The pale-faced Captain Mattina barked out a stream of orders, telling the unit to close ranks around the Rogue Trader and prepare for trouble — but then the yelling from the vox turned to laughter.

traits.locale_text: 马蒂娜上尉脸色苍白，吼出了一连串命令，让她的士兵靠拢在行商浪人身边，准备应对接下来的麻烦。然而，音阵装置传来的吼声却马上变成了哈哈大笑。

languages.text: マティナ中隊長は青ざめた顔で次々と号令をかけ、自由開拓者の周囲に陣を構えてトラブルに備えるよう部隊に命じたが、やがてヴォクスからの叫び声は笑い声に変わっていった。
languages.original_text: The pale-faced Captain Mattina barked out a stream of orders, telling the unit to close ranks around the Rogue Trader and prepare for trouble — but then the yelling from the vox turned to laughter.

traits.locale_text: マティナ中隊長は青ざめた顔で次々と号令をかけ、自由開拓者の周囲に陣を構えてトラブルに備えるよう部隊に命じたが、やがてヴォクスからの叫び声は笑い声に変わっていった。

languages.text: Die blasse Captain Mattina bellte eine Reihe von Befehlen, damit die Einheit {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} abschirmte und sich auf Ärger vorbereitete – doch dann verwandelten sich die Schreie aus dem Vox in Gelächter.
languages.original_text: The pale-faced Captain Mattina barked out a stream of orders, telling the unit to close ranks around the Rogue Trader and prepare for trouble — but then the yelling from the vox turned to laughter.

traits.locale_text: Die blasse Captain Mattina bellte eine Reihe von Befehlen, damit die Einheit {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} abschirmte und sich auf Ärger vorbereitete – doch dann verwandelten sich die Schreie aus dem Vox in Gelächter.

languages.text: Le visage pâle, la capitaine Mattina ordonna à ses hommes de serrer les rangs autour {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et de se tenir prêts... mais c'est alors que les cris venant du vox se transformèrent en rire.
languages.original_text: The pale-faced Captain Mattina barked out a stream of orders, telling the unit to close ranks around the Rogue Trader and prepare for trouble — but then the yelling from the vox turned to laughter.

traits.locale_text: Le visage pâle, la capitaine Mattina ordonna à ses hommes de serrer les rangs autour {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et de se tenir prêts... mais c'est alors que les cris venant du vox se transformèrent en rire.

languages.text: Yüzbaşı Mattina'nın beti benzi attı, emirler yağdırmaya başladı. Birime, safları sıkılaştırıp Hür Tacir'i korumalarını ve her şeye karşı hazırlıklı olmalarını buyurdu... Tam o esnada vokstan yükselen bağırış çağırış, yerini kahkahaya bıraktı.
languages.original_text: The pale-faced Captain Mattina barked out a stream of orders, telling the unit to close ranks around the Rogue Trader and prepare for trouble — but then the yelling from the vox turned to laughter.

traits.locale_text: Yüzbaşı Mattina'nın beti benzi attı ve birimine emirler yağdırmaya başladı. Birime, safları sıkılaştırıp Hür Tacir'i korumalarını ve her şeye karşı hazırlıklı olmalarını buyurdu… Tam o esnada vokstan yükselen bağırış çağırış, yerini kahkahaya bıraktı.
